resources.string: 1、Learning nursing skills to keep your baby comfortable and secure\n 2、Doing touch every day, increasing physical contact to let your baby feel love\n 3、Providing rich sensory stimulation and promoting the development of vision and hearing

Prep: Body Oil\nCore: Touching your baby can promote her physical development, improve her sense of security, and be good for her physical and mental health. It is recommended to do it before bathing or going to bed. Babies who are just trying to touch can do it for 5 minutes at first. If you like, you can repeat it, and gradually increase it to about 20 minutes.

Introduce baby bathing tips to make bathing easier. The first tip is to prepare for the bath, such as adjusting the room temperature to 26 degrees, preparing bath products, and testing the water temperature. The second tip is to wash your baby\'s hair alone before bathing. which can prevents water from entering eyes and ears, reducing discomfort. The third tip is to let your baby get in touch with the water gradually, to get used to the water temperature in advance, so that she/he will be more comfortable in the bath.

Newborn babies urinate a lot, and diapers should be changed frequently to avoid irritation to the skin. How to properly help your baby change diapers and how to avoid diapers rubbing against the umbilical cord are all important, come and learn.
